name: The Dutch Oven from The Hawthorne
description: Created by bartender Katie Emerson, this variation of an Old Fashioned is made with barrel-aged Bols Genever and two types of bitters.

recipeInstructions.text: Place sugar cubes, bitters, and soda water in a mixing glass. Muddle into a smooth paste. Add Genever, ice, and stir.
Place ice ball or large ice cube in double old fashioned glass and strain cocktail over the ice. Squeeze grapefruit twist over the top and rub around the rim. Serve.
